name: Deltaville Shrimp Dip
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup finely chopped green bell pepper
1/2 teaspoon seasoning salt or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Make at least 2 hours ahead of serving so flavors will meld: combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Place in a serving dish, cover and refrigerate. Serve over some crackers.
